mapper.select: /* ElectHisMapper.getElectHisesRevs [ElectHis.xml] */ select * from ( select seh.saf_elect_his_no ,saf_elect_his_grp_no ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY seh.saf_elect_his_grp_no ORDER BY seh.create_dt desc) as dataBoard ,seh.plant_cd ,seh.saf_elect_titl_no ,seh.dept_cd -- 부서 ,seh.user_id -- ,seh.ref_contents ,seh.elect_reason ,seh.elect_dt ,seh.elect_end_dt ,seh.lcn_type_nm ,seh.lcn_get_dt ,seh.lcn_num ,seh.use_yn ,seh.create_user_id ,seh.rev_num ,seh.rev_contents ,t.ref_law_cd ,law.code_nm as ref_law_nm ,t.elect_att_cd ,ts.code_nm as elect_att_nm ,t.elect_titl_nm ,t.qualifi_require ,cd.dept_nm ,cu.user_nm as user_nm ,createUser.user_nm as create_user_nm ,convert(char(10), seh.create_dt, 23) as create_dt ,seh.update_user_id ,updateUser.user_nm as update_user_nm ,convert(char(10), seh.update_dt, 23) as update_dt from saf_elect_his seh inner join saf_elect_titl t on seh.saf_elect_titl_no = t.saf_elect_titl_no inner join com_user cu on seh.user_id = cu.user_id and cu.use_yn = 'Y' inner join com_dept cd on cu.dept_cd = cd.dept_cd inner join com_user createUser on seh.create_user_id = createUser.user_id and createUser.use_yn = 'Y' left outer join com_user updateUser on seh.update_user_id = updateUser.user_id and updateUser.use_yn = 'Y' inner join dbo.LANG_CODE_MASTER(#{defaultParam.lang}, 'TASK_GRP') ts on t.elect_att_cd = ts.code inner join dbo.LANG_CODE_MASTER(#{defaultParam.lang}, 'MGT_LAW_CLASS') law on t.ref_law_cd = law.code where 1=1 ) A where dataBoard > 1 and saf_elect_his_grp_no = #{safElectHisNo}

/* ElectHisMapper.getHrElectTitlLcns [ElectHis.xml] */ select c.plant_cd, d.code_nm as plant_nm, b.dept_cd, c.dept_nm, a.SABUN as user_id, b.user_nm, license_gubun, license_gubun_nm , license_gubun, license_nm +' '+license_gubun_nm as license_nm, license_no, office_cd ,substring(a.lic_s_ymd,1,4) +'-'+substring(a.lic_s_ymd,5,2) +'-'+substring(a.lic_s_ymd,7,2) as lcn_get_dt from (SELECT LAW_MAN_NM, SABUN, lic_s_ymd, license_gubun, license_gubun_nm, license_nm, license_no, office_cd FROM OPENQUERY(ehr, 'SELECT LAW_MAN_NM, SABUN, lic_s_ymd, license_gubun, EHR_PSC.F_COM_GET_GRCODE_NAME(ENTER_CD, ''H20170'', LICENSE_GUBUN) as license_gubun_nm , license_no, license_nm, office_cd FROM EHR_PSC.THRM113 where enter_cd=''PSC'' ')) a inner join com_user b on a.sabun=b.user_id and b.use_yn='Y' and a.license_nm is not null inner join com_dept c on b.dept_cd=c.dept_cd and c.use_yn='Y' inner join dbo.LANG_CODE_MASTER(#{defaultParam.lang}, 'COM_PLANT_CD') d on d.code =c.plant_cd where 1=1
and c.plant_cd= #{plantCd}
and b.user_nm like '%'+#{userNm}+'%'
and license_nm like '%'+#{licenseNm}+'%'
ORDER BY plant_nm
ORDER BY plant_nm desc
ORDER BY elect_att_nm
ORDER BY elect_att_nm desc
ORDER BY elect_titl_nm
ORDER BY elect_titl_nm desc
ORDER BY dept_nm
ORDER BY dept_nm desc
ORDER BY user_nm
ORDER BY user_nm desc
ORDER BY elect_dt
ORDER BY elect_dt desc
ORDER BY elect_end_dt
ORDER BY elect_end_dt desc
ORDER BY create_dt
ORDER BY create_dt desc
ORDER BY create_user_nm
ORDER BY create_user_nm desc
order by plant_nm,a.LAW_MAN_NM, c.dept_nm, b.user_nm
OFFSET ((#{pageNumber} - 1) * #{pageSize}) ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY
